item.title: UNYIELDER launches in May
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/unyielder-launches-in-may

  • PC

Roguelite first-person shooter action game gets a release window.

Roguelite first-person shooter action game UNYIELDER will launch for PC via Steam in May, publisher Shueisha Games and developer TrueWorld Studios announced. It will support English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, German, and Spanish language options. A “Prologue” demo is currently available.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

UNYIELDER is an intense single-player boss-rush movement first-person shooter with an absurd and exploitable rogue-looter. Assemble your arsenal of destruction, smash your way through Antarctica, and face your own final boss.

UNYIELDER unites looter-shooters, movement first-person shooters, and character action games in an infinitely expandable roguelite to create spectacular, absurd and chaotic boss battles.

Boss Rush / Rogue-Looter / Movement First-Person Shooter

  • Break the Game – Like any good toy, play with it vigorously, experiment. (And have fun!)
  • Embody Tenacity – The further you go, the more dangerous the world becomes. (But so do you!)
  • Domination – Gather unique weapons and perks to empower your build and playstyle. (Or just pick the weird stuff, who’s going to stop you?)
  • BYOBoss – With parts from enemies you defeat, customize the Final Boss to unlock special weapons, perks and characters.

Erebus, the Capital City of Antarctica, 1972

A hotspot for apocalyptic-level events, after decades of existential torment, Erebus finally collapsed. Towering derelicts of the once concrete utopia are buried in dunes of rust: “PNEUMA,” a by-product of entropic weapons; Man-made “Heaven.”

Key Features

  • Carve Your Path – Journey through the war-torn lands of Erebus, Defeat enemies, loot weapons, grow in power. The Fool awaits.
  • A Walking Cataclysm of Your Own Design – Wield Rupture, Rhapsody, and Reverie, volatile sources of ineffable power. Unleash your unique brand of devastation with bizarre weapons and perks.
  • Build Your Final Boss – Scavenge the limbs of slain enemies and build your own Pattern of machine-god punching bag. Unique combinations alter the boss fight. Discover hidden Patterns to pave for new, Endgame Character classes, Weapons, Perks and other Secrets.
  • Original Soundtrack – Featuring an original soundtrack composed and produced by Karu.

Watch a new trailer below.

Boss Dossier #1: Meet the TENNULI

item.title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin teaser website, social accounts opened
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/the-seven-deadly-sins-origin-teaser-website-social-accounts-opened

  • PC
  • Smartphone

Open-world action RPG due out in 2025.

Publisher Netmarble and developer Netmarble F&C have opened the official teaser website and social accounts for open-world action RPG The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin, which will be available for console, PC, iOS, and Android in 2025.

Here are the links:

  • Teaser Website – English, Japanese, Korean
  • Twitter – English, Japanese, Korean
  • YouTube – English, Japanese, Korean

The teaser website features the following new artwork:

The latest trailer for The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin premiered at G-Star 2024 back in November 2024. If you missed it, watch it below.

G-Star 2024 Trailer

item.title: Master of Monsters SSB launches June 26 in Japan for PS5, PS4, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/master-of-monsters-ssb-launches-june-26-in-japan-for-ps5-ps4-switch-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Fantasy strategy game dated.

Fantasy strategy game Master of Monsters SSB will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on June 26 in Japan for 7,678 yen, SystemSoft Beta announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its retailer listings:

About

The latest entry in the Master of Monsters series, Master of Monsters SSB, incorporates ideas from war simulation games, with gameplay focused on commanding armies of monsters.

Key Features

  • Quality Over Quantity? There’s More Than One Right Answer! – In Master of Monsters SSB, you can group multiple of the same monster into a single unit. Even monsters that appear early in the game can become a formidable force when gathered in a group. One of the game’s key features is the wide variety of combat strategies that emerge from monster training and group battles.
  • Unique Monsters Expand Your Tactics! – A variety of monsters appear in the game, including dragons with overwhelming power, fairies capable of casting healing magic, and werewolves with the ability to turn others into their underlings. The three masters, each able to summon monsters with different attributes, and the monsters themselves, will add depth to your tactics.
  • Train Monsters with a High Level of Freedom! You May Even Unlock New Monsters…? – In addition to strengthening monsters with experience points earned in battle, you can freely enhance them and improve their abilities by increasing their stats with talismans and other methods. And as you continue to power-up your monsters, you can unlock new ones, giving you even more training options. This new Master of Monsters lets you continue to use your favorite monsters for as long as you like.

item.title: Pacific Drive ‘Endless Expeditions’ update launches April 3
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/pacific-drive-endless-expeditions-update-launches-april-3

  • PC
  • PS5

New maps, spawning systems, improved tools, and more.

The fourth free content update for Pacific Drive, dubbed “Endless Expeditions,” will launch on April 3, publisher Kepler Interactive and developer Ironwood Studios announced. It will introduce new maps, spawning systems, improved tools, and more.

Get the details below.

Hit the wide open Zone in the largest update to Pacific Drive yet!

Set off from the garage on new continuous drives—Expeditions. Dangerous and filled with their own unique rewards, these challenging trips will test even the most seasoned breacher. New maps, spawning systems, improved tools and so much more is coming April 3rd, 2025.

We’ve also created a new Suspend Run feature, something that’s been requested heavily by the community! Suspend and quit while on a trip mid-junction and return any time without losing any progress.

There’s also new cosmetic rewards for your garage, over an hour of new music on the radio, and even more lore to discover through the fax machine, Truly, this is our biggest and best update yet.

Pacific Drive is available now for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Watch a new trailer below.

Free Update “Endless Expeditions” Trailer
